cont.entity_a: Modern stainless steel look. Sleek look with under-counter lighting.
Sensor reheat and defrost options work well. No dinner plate reheat mode. Digital read-out screen failure with no fix. No exhaust fan included.
cont.entity_b: Convection oven feature used frequently. Not intuitive to use beyond basic functions. Convection mode is noisy. Good convection oven but noisy fan.

cont.entity_a: Durable with a lifespan of about 10 years. Feels flimsy and not solidly built. Replaced after 8 years due to control panel failure.
cont.entity_b: Door issues after a few months. Heavy and requires two people for installation.

Installation.comm: Fits perfectly in previous model space.

cont.entity_a: Straightforward mounting bracket and plenty of cord length. Built-in features with non-enclosed installation. Fits specific kitchen cabinet openings. Limited depth requirements make it suitable for specific installations.
cont.entity_b: Heavy and awkward to install. Fits in RV perfectly. Difficult to install due to previous incorrect installation.
High cost of ownership but worth it.
Poor packaging often results in damage. Damaged during shipping. Arrived with damage but works well.

Replacement.comm: Perfect replacement for previous Sharp model.

cont.entity_a: Exact replacement for previous model. Replaced old Kitchenaid model with the same size.
Great choice for tight spaces with a cabinet depth design. Perfect fit for custom spaces. Unique dimensions make it difficult to find alternatives.
cont.entity_b: Large compartment for cooking. Large size for cooking.

cont.entity_a: Easy to clean and door opens well.
Simple and intuitive programming. Control panel with lots of options. Buttons hard to read.
cont.entity_b: Display numbers could be larger. No handle to open door.

cont.entity_a: Powerful microwave available for built-in use. Good power and decent button options. Heats like a 900 watt oven.
Not covered under warranty due to manufacturing defect. Burn mark on waveguide cover after warranty expired.
Weak lights in the microwave and below.
Glass window may have a spotted fog-like appearance.
